32.94.text: Pastor Charles Jennings>> Thank you once again for

34.11.text: allowing us to be a part of your day and to come into

55.12.text: richly and I want to offer my word of appreciation for

70.34.text: are talking about leadership of a nation and I have

80.45.text: entitled this program, President Trump Remember What You

86.47.text: Said? In his inauguration, he said, so help me God. And
